headline: Why The Narrative Around West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) Is Shifting On 2026 Outlook And Valuation
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services just saw its fair value estimate nudged slightly, with the price target essentially steady at about US$345.71 per share, while the discount rate and revenue growth inputs were both adjusted only modestly. These tweaks reflect how recent Street research has folded refreshed EPS assumptions and a more constructive tone on growth drivers into the existing framework, rather than resetting the story around the stock. Stay with this article to see how you can keep on...
